verses.verse: וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass in the days אָ֠חָז <S%H271><s%> of Ahaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹתָ֨ם <S%H3147><s%> of Jotham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֻזִּיָּ֜הוּ <S%H5818><s%> of Uzziah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> went up רְצִ֣ין <S%H7526><s%> [that] Rezin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֲ֠רָם <S%H758><s%> of Syria וּפֶ֨קַח <S%H6492><s%> and Pekah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְמַלְיָ֤הוּ <S%H7425><s%> of Remaliah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> toward Jerusalem לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to war עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> but יָכֹ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> against it but could לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> not prevail עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיֻּגַּ֗ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לְבֵ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> the house דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying נָ֥חָֽה <S%H5117><s%> is confederate אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> Syria עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> with Ephraim וַיָּ֤נַע <S%H5128><s%> was moved לְבָבוֹ֙ <S%H3824><s%> And his heart וּלְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> and the heart עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people כְּנ֥וֹעַ <S%H5128><s%> are moved עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> as the trees יַ֖עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the wood מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> with רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> the wind

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְשַׁעְיָהוּ֒ <S%H3470><s%> unto Isaiah צֵא־ <S%H3318><s%> Go forth נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> now to meet אָחָ֔ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> you וּשְׁאָ֖ר יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7610><s%> thou and Shearjashub בְּנֶ֑ךָ <S%H1121><s%> thy son אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at קְצֵ֗ה <S%H7097><s%> at the end תְּעָלַת֙ <S%H8585><s%> of the conduit הַבְּרֵכָ֣ה <S%H1295><s%> pool הָעֶלְיוֹנָ֔ה <S%H5945><s%> of the upper אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on מְסִלַּ֖ת <S%H4546><s%> in the highway שְׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> field כוֹבֵֽס׃ <S%H3526><s%> of the fuller's

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And say אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> to him הִשָּׁמֵ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> unto him Take heed וְהַשְׁקֵ֜ט <S%H8252><s%> and be quiet אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תִּירָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> fear וּלְבָבְךָ֙ <S%H3824><s%> heart אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יֵרַ֔ךְ <S%H7401><s%> faint מִשְּׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> for the two זַנְב֧וֹת <S%H2180><s%> tails הָאוּדִ֛ים <S%H181><s%> firebrands הָעֲשֵׁנִ֖ים <S%H6226><s%> of these smoking הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these בָּחֳרִי־ <S%H2750><s%> for the fierce אַ֛ף <S%H639><s%> anger רְצִ֥ין <S%H7526><s%> of Rezin וַאֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> with Syria וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and of the son רְמַלְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H7425><s%> of Remaliah

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> because כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָעַ֥ץ <S%H3289><s%> counsel עָלֶ֛יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> Because Syria רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> have taken evil אֶפְרַ֥יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and the son רְמַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H7425><s%> of Remaliah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> against thee saying

נַעֲלֶ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> Let us go up בִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> against Judah וּנְקִיצֶ֔נָּה <S%H6973><s%> and vex וְנַבְקִעֶ֖נָּה <S%H1234><s%> it and let us make a breach אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H413><s%> in וְנַמְלִ֥יךְ <S%H4427><s%> therein for us and set מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> a king בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of it [even] the son טָֽבְאַֽל׃ <S%H2870><s%> of Tabeal ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תָק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> It shall not stand וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> come

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> For the head אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> of Syria דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> [is] Damascus וְרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> and the head דַּמֶּ֖שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus רְצִ֑ין <S%H7526><s%> [is] Rezin וּבְע֗וֹד <S%H1157><s%> and within שִׁשִּׁ֤ים <S%H8346><s%> and within threescore וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years יֵחַ֥ת <S%H2844><s%> broken אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> shall Ephraim מֵעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> that it be not a people

וְרֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> And the head אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> [is] Samaria וְרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> and the head שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son רְמַלְיָ֑הוּ <S%H7425><s%> [is] Remaliah's אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תַאֲמִ֔ינוּ <S%H539><s%> If ye will not believe כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> surely לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תֵאָמֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H539><s%> surely ye shall not be established ס
וַיּ֣וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> again יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God דַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָחָ֖ז <S%H271><s%> unto Ahaz לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

שְׁאַל־ <S%H7592><s%> Ask לְךָ֣ א֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> thee a sign מֵעִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> from יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God הַעְמֵ֣ק <S%H6009><s%> it either in the depth שְׁאָ֔לָה <S%H7585><s%> Sheol א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or הַגְבֵּ֥הַּ <S%H1361><s%> or in the height לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> above

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָחָ֑ז <S%H271><s%> But Ahaz לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶשְׁאַ֥ל <S%H7592><s%> I will not ask וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֲנַסֶּ֖ה <S%H5254><s%> test אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> ye now O house דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David הַמְעַ֤ט <S%H4592><s%> [Is it] a small thing מִכֶּם֙ <S%H4480><s%> too הַלְא֣וֹת <S%H3811><s%> for you to weary אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> of men כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for תַלְא֖וּ <S%H3811><s%> but will ye weary גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> himself shall give אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> Therefore the Lord ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> Himself לָכֶ֖ם א֑וֹת <S%H226><s%> you a sign הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָעַלְמָ֗ה <S%H5959><s%> Behold a virgin הָרָה֙ <S%H2030><s%> shall conceive וְיֹלֶ֣דֶת <S%H3205><s%> and bear בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וְקָרָ֥את <S%H7121><s%> and shall call שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name עִמָּ֥נוּ אֵֽל׃ <S%H6005><s%> Immanuel

חֶמְאָ֥ה <S%H2529><s%> Butter וּדְבַ֖שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey יֹאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> shall he eat לְדַעְתּ֛וֹ <S%H3045><s%> that he may know מָא֥וֹס <S%H3988><s%> to refuse בָּרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> the evil וּבָח֥וֹר <S%H977><s%> and choose בַּטּֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> the good

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> For בְּטֶ֨רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יֵדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> shall know הַנַּ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> For before the child מָאֹ֥ס <S%H3988><s%> to refuse בָּרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> the evil וּבָחֹ֣ר <S%H977><s%> and choose בַּטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> the good תֵּעָזֵ֤ב <S%H5800><s%> forsaken הָאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whose אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you קָ֔ץ <S%H6973><s%> that thou abhorrest מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> shall be שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> of both מְלָכֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H4428><s%> her kings

יָבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> shall bring יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עָלֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עַמְּךָ֮ <S%H5971><s%> upon thee and upon thy people וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִיךָ֒ <S%H1><s%> and upon thy father's יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> such לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have never בָ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> that have not come לְמִיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from the day סוּר־ <S%H5493><s%> departed אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> that Ephraim מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> from Judah אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [even] the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria פ

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִשְׁרֹ֤ק <S%H8319><s%> shall hiss יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD לַזְּב֔וּב <S%H2070><s%> for the fly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is in בִּקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> that [is] in the uttermost part יְאֹרֵ֣י <S%H2975><s%> of the rivers מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְלַ֨דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <S%H1682><s%> and for the bee אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> is in בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [is] in the land אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria

וּבָ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they shall come וְנָח֤וּ <S%H5117><s%> and shall rest כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> will all בְּנַחֲלֵ֣י <S%H5158><s%> valleys הַבַּתּ֔וֹת <S%H1327><s%> all of them in the desolate וּבִנְקִיקֵ֖י <S%H5357><s%> and in the holes הַסְּלָעִ֑ים <S%H5553><s%> of the rocks וּבְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנַּ֣עֲצוּצִ֔ים <S%H5097><s%> and upon all bushes וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all הַנַּהֲלֹלִֽים׃ <S%H5285><s%> and upon all thorns

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the same day הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יְגַלַּ֣ח <S%H1548><s%> shave אֲדֹנָי֩ <S%H136><s%> shall the Lord בְּתַ֨עַר <S%H8593><s%> with a razor הַשְּׂכִירָ֜ה <S%H7917><s%> that is hired בְּעֶבְרֵ֤י <S%H5676><s%> [namely] by them beyond נָהָר֙ <S%H5104><s%> the river בְּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> by the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head וְשַׂ֣עַר <S%H8181><s%> and the hair הָרַגְלָ֑יִם <S%H7272><s%> of the feet וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> will also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּקָ֖ן <S%H2206><s%> the beard תִּסְפֶּֽה׃ <S%H5595><s%> and it shall also consume ס

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יְחַיֶּה־ <S%H2421><s%> shall nourish אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [that] a man עֶגְלַ֥ת <S%H5697><s%> cow בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> a young וּשְׁתֵּי־ <S%H8147><s%> and two צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> sheep
